Name: Caribeño
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Review: A Daiquiri that is light on lime and elongated with coconut water. Delicious and very refreshing.
History: Created in 2009 by Martin Cate at Forbidden Island in Alameda, California.
Nutrition: One serving of Caribeño contains 158 calories
